definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: uprising, utterance, burden, portion (on format. cf. O1:§ 109 a Sta:§ 272 b Kö:ii. 1, 183; Ph. (Pun) has [[משאת]] = payment, tax v. Lzb:326);—abs. ´[[מ]] Ju Jdg 20:40 +; cstr. [[מַשְׂאַת]] Ge 43:34 +; pl. abs. [[מַשְׂאׂת]] Ge 43:34, + (prob.) [[מַשְׂאוֹת]] La 2:14 (v.infr.); cstr. [[מַשְׂאׂת]] Ge 43:34; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[הֶעָשָׁן]] ´[[מ]] Ju Jdg 20:38 uprising of smoke, cf. (´[[הֶע]] om.) v:Jdg 20:40.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: uplifting of hands ([[כַּפַּי]]) in prayer Ps 141:2 (‖[[תְּפִלָּה]]).

definitions.title: 4. a.
definitions.body: portion (carried to some one), esp. from table of king or superior, Ge 43:34, Ge 43:34, Ge 43:34 (J; on custom v. Di and reff.), 2Sa 11:8; so rd. perh. also 2Sa 19:43 (for MT [[נִשֵּׂאת]]) Gr HPS.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: perh. also more gen., present, largess from a superior Je 40:5 ( + [[אֲרֻחָה]] food-allowance), Es 2:18 ([[כְּיַד הַמֶּלֶח]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: exacted or enforced gift, from inferior, [[בַּר]] ´[[מ]] Am 5:11 (cf. Ph. supr.; v. also [[מנחה]]).
